con:testCase.name: setAllHeaders

con:testStep.name: Create One shot charge template - subscription - SUB_DATA

con:request.name: Create One shot charge template - subscription - SUB_DATA
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <oneShotChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_OS1" description="One shot charge"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test</description> </languageDescriptions> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <oneShotChargeTemplateType>SUBSCRIPTION</oneShotChargeTemplateType> <immediateInvoicing>false</immediateInvoicing> </oneShotChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Create One shot charge template - subscription - CMP_DATA

con:request.name: Create One shot charge template - subscription - CMP_DATA
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <oneShotChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_OS2" description="One shot charge"> <invoiceSubCategory>CMP_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test 685</description> </languageDescriptions> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <oneShotChargeTemplateType>SUBSCRIPTION</oneShotChargeTemplateType> <immediateInvoicing>false</immediateInvoicing> </oneShotChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Create One shot charge template - termination - CMP_DATA

con:request.name: Create One shot charge template - termination - CMP_DATA
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <oneShotChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_OST" description="One shot termination charge"> <invoiceSubCategory>CMP_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test 685</description> </languageDescriptions> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <oneShotChargeTemplateType>TERMINATION</oneShotChargeTemplateType> <immediateInvoicing>false</immediateInvoicing> </oneShotChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Product Charge 1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateProductChargeTemplate> <productChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRD_CHG1" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}] - Test Product Charge 1"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>[${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}] - Test Product Charge 1</description> </languageDescriptions> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <roundingModeDtoEnum>NEAREST</roundingModeDtoEnum> </productChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateProductChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Product Charge 2
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateProductChargeTemplate> <productChargeTemplate code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_PRD_CHG2" description="[${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}] - Test Product Charge 2"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>[${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}] - Test Product Charge 2</description> </languageDescriptions> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <roundingModeDtoEnum>NEAREST</roundingModeDtoEnum> </productChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateProductChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create CF for Subscription - SERVICE_CF_LONG_MATRIX
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateField> <customField code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_SERVICE_CF_LONG_MATRIX" description="Long matrix value"> <fieldType>STRING</fieldType> <appliesTo>SERVICE</appliesTo> <storageType>MATRIX</storageType> <valueRequired>false</valueRequired> <versionable>false</versionable> <triggerEndPeriodEvent>false</triggerEndPeriodEvent> <matrixColumns> <matrixColumn code="MAT_1" position="1" label="One" keyType="STRING"/> <matrixColumn code="MAT_2" position="2" label="Two" keyType="STRING"/> </matrixColumns> </customField> </ws:createOrUpdateField> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
